titleInfo.title: Irion Hall exterior view from the southwest

subject.topic: Alfred B. Irion Hall (Baton Rouge, La.)

mods.abstract: Designed to accommodate four hundred students and situated between Garig Hall and Heard Hall, the new Chemical Laboratory, Irion Hall, was finished during the session of 1908-1909. Typed on verso- Chemical Laboratories. LSU Offers a five years' course in sugar chemistry and sugar engineering that is unequalled. Graduates from this course are holding lucrative and responsible positions in every sugar-producing country, and there is a greater demand for them than can be supplied.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
mods.note: LSU Photograph Collection, 1886-1926, Louisiana State University Archives, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, LA.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
